title: November 2021 Q&A
description:
Patrons can submit questions in advance at $10/month or more through The Symbolic World website, SubscribeStar and Patreon. Questions are selected by moderators due to time constraints.

Support & submit your questions: 
- Website: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/
- Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
- Subscribestar: https://www.subscribestar.com/jonathan-pageau

- Carving workshop: https://jonathanpageau.thinkific.com/courses/st-john-baptist (PROMO CODE: Pageau15)
- Merch: http://www.thesymbolicworld.store

==========================

Timestamps:
00:00:00 - Start: announcements
00:01:15 - Books after the flood
00:02:29 - God's'Dog & NFT
00:06:59 - Jordan Peterson (4 Horsemen of Meaning)
00:08:20 - SALE: merch & carving workshop
00:09:15 - Back to NFT
00:10:13 - Start of Q&A: how it works
00:11:17 - Questions from the Symbolic World website
00:59:50 - Subscribestar questions
01:01:46 - Patreon questions
02:29:18 - Outro

==========================

- The Symbolic World website and blog: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
- My brother's book on symbolism - Language of Creation (Matthieu Pageau): https://www.amazon.com/Language-Creation-Cosmic-Symbolism-Genesis-ebook/dp/B07D738HD8
